abstract: Custom actions associated with a section.
overview:
## Discussion

This property provides programmatic access to the actions defined on a [doc://com.apple.SwiftUI/documentation/SwiftUI/Section]. If no actions were specified, the collection will be empty. The following `MailboxView` will put actions into an overflow menu if there are too many to display inline.

You can then use actions in `MailboxView` without considering overflow.
title: actions
